name: What We Left Behind
description:
Take the role of a scholar exploring the ruins of a long forgotten civilization. Something seems awry, something seems a little off; who knows What Was Left Behind?

WASD - Move
P - Pause
Mouse - Throw Items

A Spud Buds Game for the GDN Cherry Jam 2017

Your Spud Buds, hand picked from the earth, are:

Art: Kimberlea Heili
Music: Monish Corona
Design: Ven Bright
Programming: Marcello Hunt

DISCLAIMER: This is a Game Jam game and may have a few technical issues, we do have confirmation that it can be beaten, so hopefully any existing issues will not interfere with your gaming experience.
